name: Applandeo
description:
Based in Poland, Applandeo is a software house specializing in web and mobile application development. We are a team of 35 people who make use of frontend (Angular, React), backend (Node.js, PHP, Java EE, C#/.NET) and mobile (Android, iOS, Xamarin) technologies. In the first 3 years of being on the market we sucessfully completed nearly 50 major and minor projects for clients from Norway, Sweden, Germany, Swiss, UK and Middle East.
In the 2016 we participated in preparing GoodCase, a mobile app for Xamarin Evolve - the first time after Microsoft has acquired Xamarin. We have been a proud member of Xamarin Consulting Partners since 2014 whilst developing cross-platform mobile apps for our partners.
